info.author: Nick Venturella
info.comment: Sidewall is a vertical calendar skin for Rainlendar 2.

variable.name: Color_Weekdays
variable.description: Text color for weekdays (default 255,255,255)

variable.name: Color_Weekday_Events
variable.description: Text color for weekdays with events (default 0,128,255)

variable.name: Color_Weekends
variable.description: Text color for weekends (default 255,255,255)

variable.name: Color_Weekend_Events
variable.description: Text color for weekends with events (default 0,128,255)

variable.name: Text_Effect
variable.description: If Rainlendar's dropshadow effect causes problems with your chosen text colors, set this to NORMAL. Otherwise, set this to SHADOW to enable the dropshadow. (default SHADOW)

variable.name: Images_White
variable.description: Set this to 1 to use white lines and images. You must also set Images Black to 0! (default 1)

variable.name: Images_Black
variable.description: Set this to 1 to use black lines and images. You must also set Images White to 0! (default 0)

variable.name: Color_Header
variable.description: Text color for header (default 255,255,255)

variable.name: Color_Dates
variable.description: Text color for dates (default 255,255,255)

variable.name: Color_Items

variable.name: Text_Effect
variable.description: If Rainlendar's dropshadow effect causes problems with your chosen text colors, set this to NORMAL. Otherwise, set this to SHADOW to enable the dropshadow. (default SHADOW)

variable.description: Width of the event list (default 275)
